page.title: 06Nursery Farms
page.content: The Bagnall area has located in it three nurseries. These are open to the public for the sale of garden facilities,such as garden ornaments,shrubs,trees and especially,fir trees at Christmas. The garden ornaments come in a wide range, from the popular garden gnomes to conical windmills. There are also many different varieties of shrubs and trees ,such as conifers.The nuseries are best known for the selling of fir trees at Christmas.Many of the plants are kept in greenhouses,as they need to be kept warm e.g Sunflowers and Conifers.Also available from the nurseries are garden tools e.g forks,spades,hoes,etc.
